caption.p: Distribution of the protein domains found in three viral families according to their occurrence in different superkingdoms. Protein domains as they are defined in SCOPat the superfamily level and the occurrence of these domains according to Superfamily assignment ( www.supfam.org). For example, Coronaviridae encodes 13 protein domains not found in eukaryotic genomes and nine domains found in more than 90% of eukaryotic genomes.
